Key Arguments: The legislation is an attempt by the government to control free speech.
The proposed laws would give the government excessive power to force social media companies to remove posts deemed as misinformation.
There is a risk of social media platforms self-censoring and stifling legitimate views.
The government should not be the arbiter of what is considered misinformation.
The government has a history of getting facts wrong and overreaching its powers.
Freedom of speech is essential to democracy and should be respected.
Notable Quotes: These proposed Orwellian style misinformation laws would give the government the power to force social media companies to remove any posts that, in the governmentâ€™s opinion, are misinformation.
The government should not be the self appointed arbiter of wrong think.
Freedom of speech is a cornerstone of our democracy and must be respected by all institutions.
